pages.text: Traveler's Backpacks adds portable storage that combines a chest, crafting table, and fluid tank into one handy pack. $(br2)Take everything you need on the go, and never run out of storage space again.
Start by crafting a Traveler's Backpack using leather, wool, and a chest. $(br2)Equip the backpack to access its storage, and use the crafting grid for on-the-go crafting.
The backpack includes two fluid tanks for carrying water, lava, or any other fluid. $(br2)Upgrade your backpack with different colors and patterns to match your style.
